                     Welcome to the Lily Content Repository
                               Version: ${project.version}
                     --------------------------------------
                            http://lilyproject.org/


Lily is the first cloud-scalable NoSQL-based content store and search repository,
built on top of Apache HBase and SOLR.


Getting started with Lily
-------------------------

Please see the Running Lily guide on the website:

http://docs.outerthought.org/lily-docs-0_2/414-lily.html


Discussion group
----------------

Questions, suggestions, problems, one address:
http://groups.google.com/group/lily-discuss
